text: Potok () is a small village in the Municipality of Kamnik in the Upper Carniola region of Slovenia. It lies on the Nevljica River in the Tuhinj Valley. ==Name== The name of the settlement literally means 'creek, stream'. Snovišek Creek, a tributary of the Nevljica River, flows through the village. ==References== ==External links== *Potok at Geopedia * Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Kamnik
title: Potok, Kamnik
